text: Sydney Duncan Heckbert (February 9, 1873 – August 5, 1953) was a Canadian politician. He served in the Legislative Assembly of New Brunswick as member of the Conservative party representing Northumberland County from 1925 to 1930. ==References== Category:20th-century Canadian politicians Category:1868 births Category:1963 deaths Category:Progressive Conservative Party of New Brunswick MLAs
title: Sydney D. Heckbert
